name: Product Definition Editor
description: Stage 1 editor. User enters a product idea in free text. AI expands it into structured product overview with name, description, problems/solutions, key features, and target personas. User can edit any field inline.

components.name: ProductIdeaInput
components.description: Large textarea for initial product idea. Placeholder with example text. Submit button triggers AI generation. Min 1 sentence required.

components.name: ProductOverviewCard
components.description: Displays AI-generated product name and description with inline edit capability. Name is a large heading input, description is a rich textarea.

components.name: ProblemSolutionEditor
components.description: List of problem/solution pairs. Each pair is two connected inputs. Add/remove buttons. Drag to reorder. AI generates 3-6 pairs initially.

components.name: FeatureList
components.description: List of key features with name (bold) and description. Editable inline. Add/remove. AI generates 4-8 features.

components.name: PersonaCards
components.description: Grid of persona cards with name, description, and optional avatar/icon. Add/remove/edit. AI infers 2-3 personas.

components.name: DualViewToggle
components.description: Toggle between Structured View (form fields) and Raw View (JSON editor). Changes in either view sync to the other.

interactions.behavior: POST generate → AI expands into full definition → display in form
Mark stage as dirty → enable Save button
Switch between form editor and JSON editor
Re-run AI generation (keeps user input, regenerates output)
